paper_abstract: The paper discusses analytical models for the estimation of channel utilization and media access delay for IEEE 802.11 ad hoc networks in finite load conditions in the presence of hidden terminals. The simulation results show that the analytical estimated channel utilization and media access delay metrics are fairly calculated. (C) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Performance analysis of IEEE 802.11 ad hoc networks in the presence of hidden terminals
